# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (/tmp/crontab.dpeeYL/crontab installed on Fri Jan  4 09:21:53 2019)
# (Cron version -- $Id: crontab.c,v 2.13 1994/01/17 03:20:37 vixie Exp $)
# Edit this file to introduce tasks to be run by cron.
# 
# Each task to run has to be defined through a single line
# indicating with different fields when the task will be run
# and what command to run for the task
# 
# To define the time you can provide concrete values for
# minute (m), hour (h), day of month (dom), month (mon),
# and day of week (dow) or use '*' in these fields (for 'any').# 
# Notice that tasks will be started based on the cron's system
# daemon's notion of time and timezones.
# 
# Output of the crontab jobs (including errors) is sent through
# email to the user the crontab file belongs to (unless redirected).
# 
# For example, you can run a backup of all your user accounts
# at 5 a.m every week with:
# 0 5 * * 1 tar -zcf /var/backups/home.tgz /home/
# 
# For more information see the manual pages of crontab(5) and cron(8)
# 
# m h  dom mon dow   command

11  *   *   *   *   /usr/local/bin/ffmpeg -y -i http://video.news.sky.com/snr/news/snrnews.mp3 -af dynaudnorm,alimiter=limit=-8dB -ac 2 /home/john/src/radio/irn.flac
20  *   *   *   *   /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl --no-continue -R 50 -f stream-uk-audio_streaming_concrete_combined_af_akamai_uk_hls-51 -o /home/john/src/radio/bbcuknews.m4a https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/10318236/headlines-from-bbc-news
27  *   *   *   *   /usr/local/bin/get_iplayer --overwrite --limit-matches 1 --force --available-since 1 -e 100 --file-prefix bbcnews --modes=daflow -g --type radio --terse "BBC News" && /usr/local/bin/ffmpeg -y -i ~/bbcnews.raw.m4a -af dynaudnorm,alimiter=limit=-6dB -t 03:00 ~/src/radio/bbcnews.flac
#07  *   *   *   *   /usr/local/bin/ffmpeg -y -i https://www.voanews.com/mp3/voa/english/nnow/NNOW_HEADLINES.mp3 -af dynaudnorm,alimiter=limit=-10dB -t 01:59 ~/src/radio/voanews.flac
14  *   *   *   *   /usr/bin/expect -f /home/john/src/radio/insert_irn.exp
44  *   *   *   *   /usr/bin/expect -f /home/john/src/radio/insert_bbcnews.exp
29  *   *   *   *   /usr/bin/expect -f /home/john/src/radio/insert_bbcuknews.exp
